title: Person of Interest || Remembrance
author: Real Scorsese
comment: If I were a mob boss, definitely Elias would be my role model. He had class and intelligence.

I always liked him and his friendship with scarface. That kinda loyality in mob is rare. Also his admiration for Carter was so pure. So was his admiration for harold. He had class and organization level beyond any villain the team ever encountered.
Finally, someone who creates a compilation of great scenes and doesn't bury all of the amazing dialog under annoying music.
the best series in its genre,i still cant believe they canceled it   i hope the ending was a simulation and the SHAW will be back someday
description:
My montage video for Elias and Scarface.

I hope that this project will be pleased to you ;)
Can you share it? 

This is the editing of Elias and Scarface. I hope the montage will like you, because if you don't, the right arm of Elias will shoot me on a bridge. Be nice Mr Scarface. Share the video with the boss of Veni Vidi Vici!

Song : 
Remembrance - Balmorhea
Ane Brun - All My Tears
Ramin Djawadi - Can You Hear Me
Ramin Djawadi - Finch Takes Flight
